hero.slogan: Powering the Next Generation of Farmers
hero.description: Transform agricultural waste into valuable products while protecting our environment

problem.title: The Problem
problem.description: Agricultural waste management is a growing challenge. Farmers struggle with disposal costs, environmental regulations, and missed opportunities to generate additional income from their byproducts.

burning.title: Crop Waste Burning
burning.description: Millions of tons of agricultural waste are burned annually, releasing harmful pollutants

pollution.title: Air Pollution
pollution.description: Open burning contributes to smog, respiratory issues, and climate change

income.title: Lost Income
income.description: Farmers miss opportunities to monetize waste that could generate additional revenue

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.description: ChaonaNext connects farmers with businesses that can transform agricultural waste into valuable products. Our platform creates a circular economy that benefits everyone.
solution.subtitle: ChaonaNext = Connect + Reuse

connect.title: Connect
connect.description: Bridge the gap between farmers with waste and buyers seeking raw materials

reuse.title: Reuse
reuse.description: Transform waste into valuable products through innovative upcycling solutions

track.title: Track Impact
track.description: Monitor CO₂ savings and environmental benefits with real-time tracking

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Simply register your farm, list your available waste materials, and connect with buyers. Our smart matching system ensures you get the best value for your agricultural byproducts.

step1.title: List Your Waste
step1.description: Farmers easily list their agricultural waste with photos, quantity, and location

step2.title: Find & Evaluate
step2.description: Buyers browse, filter, and evaluate available waste materials for their needs

step3.title: Purchase & Track
step3.description: Complete secure transactions and track environmental impact together

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Farm?
cta.description: Join thousands of farmers already benefiting from our platform
